name: WarJS Multiplayer Arena
description:
A top-down multiplayer combat game with a focus on positioning, physics, and spell interactions. The more damage you've taken, the further you get flung on hit. How you defend is just as important as how you attack: dodging, countering, and hijacking your enemies' spells is key to making sure they're the ones hurtling into the abyss!

A short help menu is available in-game by pressing 'H' or clicking the upper-right 'HELP' button.

Options are available by pressing 'O' or clicking the upper-right 'OPTIONS' button.

https://warjs.io
